full_summary:
***
# Government Tender Announcement
**Title (English/French):** W3555-249674 - Vertical Panel Saw
**Reference Number (English/French):** WS4032169244-Doc4103058702
**Amendment Number:** 0
**Solicitation Number:** WS4032169244

## Call for Tenders
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is calling for tenders for the supply of one (1) Vertical Panel Saw unit for use in the Shipwright Work Centre at Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB). The equipment will be used to support woodworking and cabinet making activities in the Royal Canadian Navy.

## Essential Tender Requirements

* **UNSPSC Classification:** Power saws (27112709)
* **Trade Agreement:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None listed
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Colombie-Britannique

## Tender Closing Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, September 21, 2023 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Friday, September 7, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Friday, September 6, 2025

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

* Tenders will be evaluated based on lowest price

## Point of Contact
Anthony Mitch, PSPC  | (613) [ redacted] | [ mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Accessing the Tender Notice
To access the full tender notice and to submit your tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery platform at the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17322934?extsite=MTczMjI5MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17322934?extsite=MTczMjI5MzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Please note that the tender closing date is fixed, and late submissions will not be accepted. All tenders must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform.***
